articles.title: Developer shields pitched in standalone bill as Senate nears market-structure unveiling
articles.description: Senator Cynthia Lummis introduced a standalone bill to press a key point on how blockchain software developers are treated, though crypto market structure observers await the big show.

articles.title: 3 ETH price charts predict a sharp move to $4K is brewing
articles.description: ETH’s recent rally was driven by spot demand and a healthy use of futures market leverage, potentially setting Ether up for a follow-up move to $4,000.

articles.description: With Bakkt's share price surging following the announcement, the stock deal could be worth about $178 million.

articles.title: Ethereum Shouldn't Delay Preparing for Quantum Computing Threat, Says Vitalik Buterin
articles.description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin says the network should be able to function for decades without relying on constant upgrades, including resisting future quantum computers.

articles.title: Former 'Bitcoin Mayor' Eric Adams Reveals NYC Token to Fight 'Antisemitism and Anti-Americanism'
articles.description: Eric Adams, the recently departed former mayor of New York City, endorsed a cryptocurrency called "NYC Token" from Times Square on Monday.

articles.title: Dubai Bans Privacy Tokens on Regulated Exchanges
Bitcoin ‘OG whales’ sell $286M, but odds of $100K BTC remain high
articles.description: Bitcoin whales sold $286 million of BTC in January, but a slowdown in the distribution and accelerating bullish momentum could send BTC to $100,000 before the end of the month.

articles.title: Staking goes mainstream: what 2026 could look like for ether investors
articles.description: From fully staked ETFs to customizable institutional vaults, staking is evolving from a secondary consideration into a foundational pillar of Ethereum’s market structure.
